description: go.tools/cmd/cover: use a gradient to colorize "count" profiles

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6fa51207454b&repo=tools ***

go.tools/cmd/cover: use a gradient to colorize "count" profiles

R=r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10858047

https://codereview.appspot.com/10858047/diff/4001/cmd/cover/html.go
File cmd/cover/html.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10858047/diff/4001/cmd/cover/html.go#newcode173
cmd/cover/html.go:173: min, max := 0, 0
min = 1<<31 - 1
max = 0

then you don't need the complex condition on line 176

in any case you probably want to protect against len(p.Blocks) == 0

Hello r (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

PTAL

I don't calculate min at all anymore.
